name: Backup Holler Spider
description: The Backup Holler Spider is a tiny beast characterized by its agility and chaotic nature, adorned with features typical of arachnids.
memorable: This spider can emit distressing sounds that deal thunder damage and push enemies away, while also providing tactical support to allies.
goals: To cause chaos in battle and assist its allies strategically.
relations: Often found accompanying other thunder-damaging creatures or as a companion to spellcasters.
environment: Commonly resides in varied terrains that allow for climbing, such as forested areas or caves.
strengths: Possesses agility due to high Dexterity and the ability to climb surfaces easily.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Charisma scores hinder its effectiveness in melee combat and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes a melee bite that deals piercing damage and a ranged hoot that deals thunder damage and has a push effect.
most_powerful_ability: Distressed Discharge, which deals area thunder damage and provides tactical movement options.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 feet enables it to detect creatures without sight, and it has a passive Perception of 14.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, enhancing its ability to remain undetected.
additional_information: Can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings.
Gains advantage on perception and stealth when motionless.
Provides tactical advantages to allies casting thunder damage spells.
Can push back targets on critical hit with its ranged attack.
